137540.「まあ……！\n レッスンチケットを持っていませんね。\n 授業を受けたければ:
Well...! I have your lesson ticket... If you
want to take the class, you'll have to come
back next week...<bw_break>

137541.「おお。<pc>君。\n シュメリア先生から聞いているよ。\n 君の授業を 担当:
Oh. You. Ms. Schumeria told me that... Your class, Somma... By taking a class at this academy, you'll receive one skill note for
your chosen subject. And sometimes you'll even be able to learn additional skill notes from classmates sitting near you... When you
take a class, choose your seat carefully from among the available seats. ... Oops. I haven't given you your lesson ticket yet...

137542.「……また 学びに来なさい。\n レッスンチケットがあれば\n いつでも 授業を:
... I'll be back to learn... With a lesson
ticket, you can take classes whenever you
want...<end>

137543.「何について 聞きたいのかね？\n<break>: What would you like to talk about?<break>

137544.「授業を 受けることで\n 君が選んだ 科目のスキルノートが\n ひとつ手に入る:
As you take classes, you'll receive one Skill Note for each subject you choose. The more classes you take, the higher your academic
level will be, and the better your skill notes will be. And you can even learn the recommended skills of the classmates sitting
near you as skill notes! In addition, you'll be able to deepen your friendship with the classmate sitting near you and gain the light
of friendship... In each case, the classmates seated in front, behind, to the left and right of you... Think carefully before you
choose your seat...

137545.「おすすめスキル設定では\n 他のクラスメイトへの おすすめスキルを\n 設定す:
The recommended skills setting allows you to recommend skills to other classmates... By setting up attractive skills, you can make it
easier for other classmates to sit next to you in class... And if you can get them to sit next to you, then you can deepen your
friendship, and you can get a lot of friendship light... Use the recommended skill settings and enjoy your school life!

137546.「他に 聞きたい事はあるかね？\n<break>: Is there anything else you'd like to tell me?<break>

137547.「本当に その席で よいかしら？\n<yesno2><break>: Are you sure you want to sit there?<yesno2><break>

137549.「授業を受ける座席を 選んでください。\n ……前後左右に クラスメイトが座って:
You may select your seat for the class... ... When you have classmates sitting in front of you, behind you, to your left and to your
right, a lot of things can happen.

you take, the higher your "skill level" will be, and the more classes you'll be able to take. You will also be able to make

carefully...

139631.「何について 聞きたいの？\n<break>: What do you want to talk about?<break>

139632.「この学園の授業は 選択制です。\n 授業を受けると あなたが選んだ授業の\n:
The classes at this school are elective. When you take a class, you'll get one of the skill notebooks for the class you've chosen. The
more classes you take, the higher your "skill level" will be, and the more classes you'll be able to take. You'll also gain the light
of friendship as you grow closer and closer to your classmates. You'll also be able to learn the recommended skills of your
classmates in the form of skill notes... In each case, it's the classmate sitting next to you on the left, right, or front... Please
choose your seats carefully.

139633.「おすすめスキルに 魅力的なスキルを\n 設定しておけば となりの生徒との友情が:
If you set up attractive skills in the Recommended Skills section, you'll be able to deepen your friendship with the student next
to you, and gain more friendship light... In your skill notebooks, set up skill recommendations for your classmates in the
same group as you...

classmates in the form of skill notes! In each case, it's the classmate sitting next to you on the front, back, left or right...
Think carefully before you choose your seat...

the more friendship you'll gain. From your skill notebooks, you will set up skill recommendations for you and your classmates
in your group!

141645.「授業を 受けるには\n そのレッスンチケットが １枚必要だ。\n<br>\n「:
To take a class, you need a lesson ticket... I'll give you 7 lesson tickets each week. If we run out, we'll come back the following
week... You're a first timer! I'll give you three more as a bonus! Go ahead, take a lesson!

141647.「授業を 受けるには\n そのレッスンチケットが １枚必要です。\n<br>\n:
To take a class, you need one of those lesson tickets. You will receive seven lesson tickets each week. But if you have more than
99 tickets, we can't give you more than that... You have to take classes often. Okay, well... Since you're new here, I'll give you
three more tickets. I'll give you three more tickets to try out the class.

have more than 99 tickets, I can't give you more than that... You have to take the lessons often! That's right... Since you're
new, I'll give you three more tickets. Try out a class first.

give more than that. You'll have to attend class often! Hmm... Since you're new here, I'll give you three more tickets... I'll give

152911.「クラスメイト設定では\n 他の クラスメイトへの\n 設定をすることができる。:
Classmate preferences allow you to set preferences for other classmates... You can write comments that you want to share with
other classmates in class or in the martial arts arena... The public setting allows you to switch between being a classmate and a
supportive friend... You can also use the classmate settings to make your school life more fun!

152912.「クラスメイト設定では\n <pc>の クラスメイトに向けた\n さまざまな設定:
In the classmate setting You can create a variety of settings for your classmates... You can write comments that you want to share with other classmates in class
or on the martial arts field... You can also use the public settings to switch between being someone's classmate and being their
support buddy. You can also use the classmate setting to enjoy school life...

152913.「クラスメイト設定では\n <pc>の クラスメイトに向けた\n さまざまな設定:
In the classmate setting You can set up a variety of settings for your classmates! Write comments that you want to share with other classmates in class or in
the martial arts arena... You can also use public settings to switch between being someone's classmate and being their support
buddy... Use your classmate settings to enjoy your time at school!

152914.「クラスメイト設定では\n <pc>さんの クラスメイトに向けた\n さまざまな:
In the classmate setting You can set up a variety of settings for your classmates... You can write comments that you want to share with other classmates in class
or in the martial arts hall... You can also use the public settings to switch between being someone's classmate and being their
support buddy... You can also use the classmate setting to enjoy your school life...

152915.「クラスメイト設定では\n <pc>君の クラスメイトに向けた\n さまざまな設:
In the classmate setting A variety of settings for your classmates... You can write comments that you want to share with other classmates in class or on the
martial arts floor. You can also use the public settings to switch between being someone's classmate and being their support
buddy. You can also use the classmate settings to make your school life more fun!

153942.「おすすめスキル設定をしてないな？\n 先に おすすめスキルを設定してから\n:
You haven't set up your recommended skills,
have you? Set your recommended skills first,
then you can take the class!<bw_break>

153943.「おや……おすすめスキルが\n まだ 設定されていないようですね。\n<br>\:
Oh... It looks like you haven't set your skill recommendations yet. Before we begin, I'd like to recommend some skills for you and
your fellow classmates...

153944.「あら……おすすめスキルが\n まだ 設定されていないようね。\n<br>\n「:
Oh, no... You don't have any recommended skills yet... Before you go to class, you'll need to set up your recommended skills for
your classmates.

153945.「まあ……おすすめスキルが\n まだ 設定されていないわね……。\n<br>\n:
Well... You haven't set your recommended skills yet. Before you begin class, I'd like you to set up a skill recommendation for
yourself and your fellow classmates.

153946.「む……おすすめスキルが\n まだ 設定されていないようだな。\n<br>\n「:
No... I don't see any recommended skills yet. Before you take the class, you'll need to set the recommended skills for you and your
fellow classmates!

have to give you a lesson ticket... Let's get

don't need to give you a lesson ticket...
